object.description: Indicates the type of object, which should be 'refund'.

amount.description: The amount refunded in the smallest currency unit (e.g. cents).

balance_transaction.description: ID of the balance transaction that describes the impact on your account balance.

charge.description: ID of the charge that was refunded.

created.description: Timestamp representing when the refund was created.

updated.description: Timestamp representing when the refund was last updated.

metadata.description: Any additional data or information associated with the refund.

payment_intent.description: ID of the payment intent associated with the refund.

reason.description: The reason for the refund (e.g. duplicate, fraudulent).

receipt_number.description: Unique identifier for the refund receipt.

source_transfer_reversal.description: Details of any transfer reversal associated with the refund source.

status.description: The status of the refund (e.g. succeeded, pending).

transfer_reversal.description: Details of any transfer reversal associated with the refund.

destination_details.description: Details about the destination of the refunded amount.

card.description: Information related to the card used for the refund.

reference.description: ID of the payment method used for the refund.

reference_status.description: The status of the payment method reference.

reference_type.description: The type of payment method reference (e.g. card).
